default_recommendations.title: The Starry Night
default_recommendations.description: One of Van Gogh's most famous works, painted while he was staying in the Saint-Paul-de-Mausole asylum in Saint-Rémy-de-Provence, France.

default_recommendations.title: Water Lilies
default_recommendations.description: Part of Monet's Water Lilies series, painted in his garden at Giverny.

default_recommendations.title: The Persistence of Memory
default_recommendations.description: One of Dalí's most recognizable works, featuring the iconic melting clocks.

default_recommendations.title: The Kiss
default_recommendations.description: A masterpiece of the Art Nouveau period, depicting two lovers embracing.

default_recommendations.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
default_recommendations.description: One of Vermeer's most famous works, often referred to as the 'Mona Lisa of the North'.
